eventDecorators.name: Borrow
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a market asset is borrowed. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: BuyLiquidatedCollateral
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a liquidated collateral is purchased in exchange for the specified market. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: CollateralLiquidated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the collateral is liquidated. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: Collateralize
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the collateral asset is deposited. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: HoldefiPricesContractChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when HoldefiPrices contract is changed. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationReserveDeposited
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a liquidation reserve is deposited. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationReserveWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a liquidation reserve is withdrawn by the owner. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: OperationPaused
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an operation is paused by the pauser. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: OperationUnpaused
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an operation is unpaused by the owner. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferRequested
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is recieved. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when an ownership transfer request is accepted by the pending owner. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: PauserChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the pauser is changed by the owner. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: PromotionDebtUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a promotion debt is updated. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: PromotionReserveDeposited
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a promotion reserve is deposited. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: PromotionReserveUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a promotion reserve is updated. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: PromotionReserveWithdrawn
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a promotion reserve is withdrawn by the owner. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: RepayBorrow
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a borrow is repaid. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: Supply
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a market asset is supplied. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateBorrowIndex
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the borrow index is updated for a market asset. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateSupplyIndex
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the supply index is updated for a market asset. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawCollateral
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when the collateral is withdrawn. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

eventDecorators.name: WithdrawSupply
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when a supply is withdrawn. Emitted when token is purchased by `to` in `token` for `price`.

functionDecorators.name: acceptTransferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Pending owner accepts ownership of the contract. Only Pending owner can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: approveBorrow
functionDecorators.description: Sender approves the account to borrow a given market based on given collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount is allowed to be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: approveWithdrawCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Sender approves the account to withdraw the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount is allowed to be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: approveWithdrawSupply
functionDecorators.description: Sender approves the account to withdraw supply.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount is allowed to be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: batchPause
functionDecorators.description: Called by pausers to pause operations, triggers stopped state for selected operations.

parameterDecorators.name: pauseDurations
parameterDecorators.description: List of durations specifying the pause time of each operation.

functionDecorators.name: batchUnpause
functionDecorators.description: Called by pausers to unpause operations, returns to normal state for selected operations.

functionDecorators.name: beforeChangeBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Update a market borrow index, supply index, promotion reserve, and promotion debt.

functionDecorators.name: beforeChangeSupplyRate
functionDecorators.description: Update a market supply index, promotion reserve, and promotion debt.

functionDecorators.name: borrow
functionDecorators.description: Borrow an asset.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the given market will be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: borrowBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender borrows an asset belonging to the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: buyLiquidatedCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Buy collateral in exchange for ETHmsg.value The amount of the given market that will be paid.

functionDecorators.name: buyLiquidatedCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Buy collateral in exchange for ERC20 asset.

parameterDecorators.name: market
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the market asset should be paid to buy collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: marketAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the given market will be paid.

functionDecorators.name: collateralize
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ERC20 asset as collateral.

functionDecorators.name: collateralize
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ETH as collateralmsg.value The amount of ETH will be collateralized.

functionDecorators.name: collateralizeBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender deposits ETH as collateral belonging to another usermsg.value The amount of ETH sender deposits.

functionDecorators.name: collateralizeBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender deposits ERC20 asset as collateral belonging to another user.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of asset sender deposits.

functionDecorators.name: depositLiquidationReserve
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ERC20 asset as liquidation reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that will be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: depositLiquidationReserve
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ETH asset as liquidation reservemsg.value The amount of ETH that will be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: depositPromotionReserve
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ETH as promotion reservemsg.value The amount of ETH that will be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: depositPromotionReserve
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ERC20 asset as promotion reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that will be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountBorrow
functionDecorators.description: Returns balance and interest of an account for a given market on a given collateral. borrowInterest = accumulatedInterest + (balance * (marketBorrowIndex - userLastBorrowInterestIndex)).

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: Borrower address to get Borrow information.

returnDecorators.name: balance
returnDecorators.description: Borrowed amount on the specified market.

returnDecorators.name: interest
returnDecorators.description: The amount of interest the borrower should pay.

returnDecorators.name: currentBorrowIndex
returnDecorators.description: Borrow index for the given market at current time.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountBorrowAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns maximum amount spender can withdraw from account borrows on a given market based on a given collteral.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Maximum amount spender can withdraw from account borrows on a given market based on a given collteral.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Returns collateral balance, time since last activity, borrow power, total borrow value, and liquidation status for a given collateral. borrowPower = (collateralValue / collateralValueToLoanRate) - totalBorrowValueliquidationThreshold = collateralValueToLoanRate - 5%User will be in liquidation state if (collateralValue / totalBorrowValue) < liquidationThreshold.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: Account address to get collateral information.

returnDecorators.name: balance
returnDecorators.description: Amount of the specified collateral.

returnDecorators.name: timeSinceLastActivity
returnDecorators.description: Time since last activity performed by the account.

returnDecorators.name: borrowPowerValue
returnDecorators.description: The borrowing power for the account of the given collateral.

returnDecorators.name: totalBorrowValue
returnDecorators.description: Accumulative borrowed values on the given collateral.

returnDecorators.name: underCollateral
returnDecorators.description: A boolean value indicates whether the user is in the liquidation state or not.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountSupply
functionDecorators.description: Returns balance and interest of an account for a given market. supplyInterest = accumulatedInterest + (balance * (marketSupplyIndex - userLastSupplyInterestIndex)).

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: Supplier address to get supply information.

returnDecorators.name: balance
returnDecorators.description: Supplied amount on the specified market.

returnDecorators.name: interest
returnDecorators.description: Profit earned.

returnDecorators.name: currentSupplyIndex
returnDecorators.description: Supply index for the given market at current time.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountTotalBorrowValue
functionDecorators.description: Returns total borrow value of an account based on a given collateral.

returnDecorators.name: totalBorrowValue
returnDecorators.description: Accumulative borrowed values on the given collateral.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountWithdrawCollateralAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns maximum amount spender can withdraw from account balance on a given collateral.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Maximum amount spender can withdraw from account balance on a given collateral.

functionDecorators.name: getAccountWithdrawSupplyAllowance
functionDecorators.description: Returns maximum amount spender can withdraw from account supplies on a given market.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Maximum amount spender can withdraw from account supplies on a given market.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentBorrowIndex
functionDecorators.description: Returns borrow index and borrow rate for the given market at current time. newBorrowIndex = oldBorrowIndex + (deltaTime * borrowRate).

returnDecorators.name: borrowIndex
returnDecorators.description: Borrow index of the given market.

returnDecorators.name: borrowRate
returnDecorators.description: Borrow rate of the given market.

functionDecorators.name: getCurrentSupplyIndex
functionDecorators.description: Returns supply index and supply rate for a given market at current time. newSupplyIndex = oldSupplyIndex + (deltaTime * supplyRate).

returnDecorators.name: supplyIndex
returnDecorators.description: Supply index of the given market.

returnDecorators.name: supplyRate
returnDecorators.description: Supply rate of the given market.

functionDecorators.name: getDiscountedCollateralAmount
functionDecorators.description: Returns the amount of discounted collateral can be bought in exchange for the amount of a given market.

parameterDecorators.name: marketAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of market should be paid.

returnDecorators.name: collateralAmountWithDiscount
returnDecorators.description: Amount of discounted collateral can be bought.

functionDecorators.name: getLiquidationReserve
functionDecorators.description: The collateral reserve amount for buying liquidated collateral.

returnDecorators.name: reserve
returnDecorators.description: Liquidation reserves for the given collateral.

functionDecorators.name: getPromotionDebt
functionDecorators.description: Returns promotion debt for a given market at current time. promotionDebtScaled is scaled by secondsPerYear * rateDecimals.

returnDecorators.name: promotionDebtScaled
returnDecorators.description: Promotion debt of the given market.

functionDecorators.name: getPromotionReserve
functionDecorators.description: Returns promotion reserve for a given market at current time. promotionReserveScaled is scaled by (secondsPerYear * rateDecimals).

returnDecorators.name: promotionReserveScaled
returnDecorators.description: Promotion reserve of the given market.

functionDecorators.name: holdefiCollaterals
functionDecorators.description: Contract for holding collaterals.

functionDecorators.name: holdefiPrices
functionDecorators.description: Contract for getting asset prices.

functionDecorators.name: holdefiSettings
functionDecorators.description: Contract for getting protocol settings.

functionDecorators.name: isPaused
functionDecorators.description: Returns the pause status of a given operation.

returnDecorators.name: res
returnDecorators.description: Pause status of a given operation.

functionDecorators.name: liquidateBorrowerCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Liquidate borrower's collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: borrower
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the borrower who should be liquidated.

functionDecorators.name: pause
functionDecorators.description: Called by pausers to pause an operation, triggers stopped state.

parameterDecorators.name: pauseDuration
parameterDecorators.description: The length of time the operation must be paused.

functionDecorators.name: pauser
functionDecorators.description: Pauser can pause operations but can't unpause them.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrow
functionDecorators.description: Repay an ERC20 asset based on a given collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the market will be Repaid.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrow
functionDecorators.description: Repay an ETH based on a given collateralmsg.value The amount of ETH will be repaid.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrowBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender repays an ETH based on a given collateral belonging to the borrowermsg.value The amount of ETH sender repays.

functionDecorators.name: repayBorrowBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender repays an ERC20 asset based on a given collateral belonging to the borrower.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the market will be repaid.

functionDecorators.name: reserveSettlement
functionDecorators.description: Promotion reserve and debt settlement.

functionDecorators.name: setHoldefiPricesContract
functionDecorators.description: Set Holdefi prices contract only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: newHoldefiPrices
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the new Holdefi prices contract.

functionDecorators.name: setPauser
functionDecorators.description: Called by owner to set a new pauser.

functionDecorators.name: supply
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ETH for supplyingmsg.value The amount of asset supplier supplies.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: supply
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ERC20 asset for supplying.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of asset supplier supplies.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: supplyBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender supplies ETH belonging to the suppliermsg.value The amount of ETH sender deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: supplyBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender supplies ERC20 asset belonging to the supplier.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of asset sender deposits.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: A unique code used as an identifier of the referrer.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new owner. Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: unpause
functionDecorators.description: Called by owner to unpause an operation, returns to normal state.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw the collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount will be withdrawn from the collateral.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawCollateralBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender withdraws the collateral belonging to another user.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount will be withdrawn from the collateral.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawLiquidationReserve
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw liquidation reserve only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that will be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawPromotionReserve
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw promotion reserve only by the owner.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount that will be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawSupply
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw supply of a given market.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount will be withdrawn from the market.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawSupplyBehalf
functionDecorators.description: Sender withdraws supply belonging to the supplier.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount will be withdrawn from the market.
